metadata.name: BOND HOUSE
metadata.description:
Story behind the artwork:

The Bond films are classics. Again and again extravagant or abandoned places, hotel, buildings, etc. play the film backdrop for it. Inspired by this, this work of art was created. I can literally see the script in front of me. Mr. Bond and his antagonist are up to mischief in this hotel. There is also a jump into the lake and a chase into the mountains. No Bond film is complete without female beauty. Everyone is welcome to imagine her for themselves.

Artist: Kathrin Federer
Created 2022 in Photoshop
8832 x 7360 px | 300 dpi
Edition 1/1

Valid Copyright and License: CC-ND-SA.
The collector receives the original JPG and TIFF on request.
